newsitem.title: TUNISIA: France grants Tunisia 150 mln francs credit.
newsitem.headline: France grants Tunisia 150 mln francs credit.

text.p: France granted Tunisia a 150 million francs ($29 million) credit for training programmes, officials said Thursday.

The accord was signed on Thursday in Tunis by Tunisian Minister for International Cooperation and Foreign Investment Mohamed Ghannouchi and Antoine Pouillieute, Director General of France's Caisse Francaise de Development, a state-agency for chanelling credits for cooperation. ($1=5.16 francs)
